document.full_text: billionaire hedge-fund manager steven cohen is bidding for a minority stake in the new york mets baseball team as it tries to raise about $200 million to cover losses and pay down debt, the wall street journal reported, citing sources.
document.title: steve cohen bidding for minority stake in new york mets: report
lines_and_colors: billionaire hedge-fund manager steven cohen is bidding for a minority stake in the new york mets baseball team as it tries to raise about $200 million to cover losses and pay down debt, the wall street journal reported, citing sources.
